Reviews.Title: polaroid 9.0mp camera
Reviews.Author: jessc71
Reviews.Content: This is a really good camera. i purchased it for my daughter as a birthday gift, and she absolutely loves it. the picture quality is excellent, and it is so light and compact that my daughter can take it with her anywhere. she thinks its great, and for the price -- i do as well!!

Reviews.Title: Stuartyh, POS Trinidad
Reviews.Author: Stuartyh
Reviews.Content: My previous cam was a Polaroid a300, it was a dudThis camera works like a charmI am looking to buy another one for my daughter now

ProductInfo.Features:
Features: Shake Reduction Technology, Blink Detection, Face Detection Technology, Voice Recorder, Easy-to-Read Menu System, Graphical User Interface, Color TFT LCD Screen
Display Size: 2.5 "
Zoom: 0. X Optical , 8.0 X Digital
Built-In Memory Capacity: 16MB
Image Resolution: 3472 x 2604
ProductInfo.Name: Polaroid 9.0MP Compact Digital Camera - Orange
